Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits certain limited-profit housing companies from voluntarily dissolving during the state disaster emergency declared in response to the outbreak of COVID-19
Summary: Prohibits certain limited-profit housing companies from voluntarily dissolving or semi-privatizing during the state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order 202 of 2020 in response to the outbreak of novel coronavirus, COVID-19.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to prohibiting certain limited-profit housing companies from voluntarily dissolving during the state disaster emergency declared in response to the outbreak of COVID-19
